vote.title: Authorize an amendment to the loan agreement with South Dallas Fair Park/Innercity Community Development Corporation for the development of single-family homes for the Scattered Sites project to (1) reduce HOME Investment Partnerships Program loan amount from $1,220,000.00 to $286,775.47; and (2) reduce the number of single-family homes from eleven to five to allow the closeout of the project to occur based on Resolution Nos. 15-1080 and 16-1224 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: Authorize an amendment to the loan agreement with South Dallas Fair Park/Innercity Community Development Corporation for the development of single-family homes for the Scattered Sites project to (1) reduce HOME Investment Partnerships Program loan amount from $1,220,000.00 to $286,775.47; and (2) reduce the number of single-family homes from eleven to five to allow the closeout of the project to occur based on Resolution Nos. 15-1080 and 16-1224 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
